name: Infinite Deathchase
description:
This game was entered in the Retro Jam 2021. 

It attempted to duplicate the 1983 game "Deathchase" by Mervyn Estcourt for the ZX Spectrum. This game should be color accurate to the original Spectrum, but the resolution has been increased a little from the original 256x192 to 320x200. 

Audio is a copy from the game (a placeholder, sorry for the short loop).

Built with Dragon Ruby.

Use left and right arrows and spacebar to shoot. 

Retro Jam 2021 Note:

I ran out of time for multiple enemies and for nite patrol. I had fun making this.
